BroadcastChannel.name: broadcastChannelId
BroadcastChannel.desc: The unique address by which the BroadcastService can be identified in a provider lineup. In US, this is typically a number.

BroadcastChannel.name: broadcastServiceTier
BroadcastChannel.desc: The type of service required to have access to the channel (e.g. Standard or Premium).

BroadcastChannel.name: providesBroadcastService
BroadcastChannel.desc: The BroadcastService offered on this channel.

BroadcastChannel.name: genre
BroadcastChannel.desc: Genre of the creative work, broadcast channel or group.
